alert.note: Alert for Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 10:54AM CDT until May 15 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Wild Rice River (MN) at Hendrum affecting Norman County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Red Lake River at Crookston affecting Polk County. Snake River AT Alvarado affecting Marshall County. Buffalo River near Hawley affecting Clay County. Snake River below Warren affecting Marshall County. .This morning`s river forecasts (Monday) take into account past precipitation that has occurred and forecast precipitation from 7 am this morning through 7 am Tuesday morning. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Snake River at Alvarado. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 106.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. Storm sewer flood gates are closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 103.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 107.0 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday evening. - Flood stage is 106.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
